# simplemdm_scriptjobs (Data Source)

Fetches the collection of script jobs from your SimpleMDM account.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Fetch all script jobs
data "simplemdm_scriptjobs" "all" {
}

output "script_job_count" {
  value = length(data.simplemdm_scriptjobs.all.script_jobs)
}
```

```terraform
# Fetch script jobs with pagination
data "simplemdm_scriptjobs" "limited" {
  limit          = 50
  starting_after = 1000
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `limit` (Number) Maximum number of script jobs to return (1-100). Defaults to 100. When not specified, all jobs will be fetched with automatic pagination.
- `starting_after` (Number) Return script jobs with IDs after this value for pagination.

### Read-Only

- `script_jobs` (Block List) Collection of script job records returned by the API. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--script_jobs))

<a id="nestedblock--script_jobs"></a>
### Nested Schema for `script_jobs`

Read-Only:

- `assignment_group_id` (String) The ID of the assignment group this job targets.
- `content` (String) Script contents that were executed by the job.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the job was created.
- `created_by` (String) User or API key that created the job.
- `custom_attribute` (String) Custom attribute ID that stores the job output, when configured.
- `custom_attribute_regex` (String) Regular expression used to sanitize the custom attribute output.
- `devices` (Attributes List) Execution results for each targeted device. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--script_jobs--devices))
- `errored_count` (Number) Number of devices that failed to execute the script.
- `id` (String) Script job identifier.
- `job_identifier` (String) Short identifier string for the job (different from the numeric ID).
- `job_name` (String) Human friendly name of the job.
- `pending_count` (Number) Number of devices that have not yet reported a result.
- `script_id` (String) The ID of the script associated with this job.
- `script_name` (String) Name of the script that was executed.
- `status` (String) Current execution status of the job (pending, completed-with-errors, completed, cancelled).
- `success_count` (Number) Number of devices that completed successfully.
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the job was last updated.
- `variable_support` (Boolean) Indicates whether the script supports variables.

<a id="nestedatt--script_jobs--devices"></a>
### Nested Schema for `script_jobs.devices`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) Device identifier.
- `response` (String) Output returned by the device, when available.
- `status` (String) Execution status reported for the device.
- `status_code` (String) Optional status code returned by the device.
